metadata.dc:author: Bonome, C
metadata.dc:description: The contributions of remifentanil to anesthesia for heart surgery is described. The pharmacokinetic properties are described along with our clinical experience with the various modes and doses of perfusion for induction as well as during and after surgery.
metadata.dc:title: Remifentanilo en cirugía cardíaca.
[Remifentanil in heart surgery].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de anestesiologia y reanimacion
